data.title: My go to
data.text: We love Jardin. It is a very neighborhood type restaurant with consistent food. Everything on the menu is as expected. They make fantastic 'Tuna' Margaritas! When you want comfort Mexican food, drink and atmosphere head to Jardin.

data.title: Great local grub!
data.text: We have visited here several times. The food and service is always good. Very reasonable prices for good Mexican food. Our favorite is the soup. Wouldn't hesitate to go when you're craving some down home grub.

data.title: back home eating
data.text: i love this restaurant. It is small and the personal service is great. after going there a few times they knew what we always wanted to ordered.

data.title: We like Jardin!
data.text: We go there quite a bit.  There is better Mexican food but they are family run establishment and the food is pretty good.   Love the atmosphere and the Prickly Pear Margarita.   Its a Cedar Park staple at this point.

data.title: Great local place
data.text: Once we found this place we were hooked on returning. They have good food and it's always worth while to support local business.

data.title: What happened to this place?
data.text: We have been going to Jardin Corona's in Cedar Park for years.  We went for dinner tonight, a Saturday, at 6:00, and the place was dead.  I just wanted tacos!  They came amazingly quick, before my husband even dipped a chip in queso.  The tacos were totally unseasoned...I'm talking plain hamburger, in these bizarrely thick taco shells.  My husband had a typical enchilada plate, and they were also totally flavorless.  It's like I was eating Tex-Mex in Minnesota!  The drinks were good, queso the usual Velveeta and Rotel, but we will join the hoardes staying away.  It's been a good long run, and we miss the food in the good old days.  Oh yeah, that menu is WAY too much!

data.title: Love this place
data.text: Always go here when we don't know what to do for dinner. Food is always good and service is fast. My favorite is the SUPER TUCAN!

data.title: Jardin satisfy's your TexMex cravings
data.text: Jardin Corona is a great neighborhood restaurant with a staff that is familiar and tends to know their regulars.  The thing that brings folks in is the uncompromising standards the restaurant holds itself to when creating each dish.  The food is delicious and the environment is warm and friendly. I have been going to Jardin Corona for well over 10 years and use this place as a staple whenever I have out of town guests.  If you're ever in the area please stop by.  Your tummy will be glad you did.  Oh and don't be put off by the location, Jardin Corona is the anchor of this small strip mall just off of S. Bell Avenue.

data.title: Fajitas rather bland and tough
data.text:
Have been here a few times but the last time I found the fajitas too be not too good. Restaurant is in pretty old buIlding but seems to be kept up and did not seen at all dirty. Of course I have never been in the kitchen.
Had beef fajitas and was not impressed. The meat was pretty bland and was very tough.
Prices are good but it appears that is relative.

data.title: Solid Mexican Food
data.text: I always eat here with my family when visiting.  Great mexican food, family friendly, and wonderful service.  I have never had a bad meal here and it is always so tasty!  If you like Tex-Mex, this is a great place to take your family.  It is a little on the noisy side and frequently crowded!

data.title: Sir
data.text: My girlfriend and I visit Jardin Corona two times a month. Good food good Margaritas and good service.

data.title: Everything You Want In Mexican Food
data.text:
We arrived after lunch at around 1230 and expected a large crowd. Surprisingly there were a few seats open so we got in fairly quickly. We had a party of eight people and we were quickly attended. My husband and I got the fajitas for two and they were delicious. The kids meals are quite generous for 3.95. Daughter number one got a cheeseburger and fries and daughter number two got grilled cheese and fries both said they were delicious.
The chips are hot in the salsa was fresh. What more could you ask for?

data.title: Great TEX MEX
data.text: Love their chimichangas, chips are good, service is always great! Price fair and good servings. Lunch specials are very nice., love the Tuesday Wednesday, and Thursday the best :) Also best Tortilla Soup around!

data.title: Best Mexican food in Cedar Park
data.text:
I like the cheese enchilada plate, the ground beef chimichanga (with queso on top), and the tortilla soup! And the servers are fast and almost all are very friendly. Their chips, salsa and queso are also good. Good lunch specials (includes a drink), and they will bring you're food out in plenty of time for you to make it back to work. 
The only problem is parking. The parking lot has a lot of pot holes, and the spaces are too close together. But it's worth it!

data.title: Deelish Migas
data.text: Been going to Jardin for many many years - also the one on Pond Springs.  Great food great margs.  Love their Migas!!

data.title: packed almost every night
data.text: Some of the best marquites in town . food is great . get their early the place is packed almost every night

data.title: Mexican Food
data.text: The place is run down and tucked away in the back of the strip center, but the food is always great! I go there quite often and recommend it to everyone! the service is fast too!

data.title: Our last time earing here :(
data.text: We have been eating here for at least 8 years and sadly today will be our last time. In the past it was solid good tex mex; good service , good food, good atmosphere. In the past year or so it has steadily gone downhill and today's experience solidified that we will not be back. Tasteless (boiled, bland, tough chicken enchiladas) lukewarm food coupled with indifferent/nonchalant service has finally taken its toll. There are sooooooooo many tex me restaurants in CP now, better to visit one of them instead. Not sure if the owners are leaving it up to a new generation, but it's clearly not the same and the food is just not good.

data.title: Good Tex-Mex
data.text: It is a strip mall restaurant that has been a favorite of mine for years. Nothing fancy, but very good food at reasonable prices. Portions are generous and the margaritas are great anytime of day.

data.title: Our regular spot
data.text: We eat here often.  The food is priced well, and the staff is so nice.  The food tastes great, and is always served quickly.
